PropertyValue.Value: select blii.line_name,bsi.station_cn_name,t.cash_box_id,poi.operator_name,t.update_date,t.update_time ,(case substr(t.cash_box_id,3,2) when '11' then '硬币回收箱' when '21' then '纸币补充箱' when '22' then '纸币回收箱' else '未知' end) as regist_status from cash_box_register_info t left join basi_line_id_info blii on blii.line_id = t.line_id left join basi_station_info bsi on bsi.station_id = t.station_id left join priv_operator_info poi on poi.operator_id = t.operator_id
